about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse
matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or
general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a
direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian
factorization.
about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver

name: mumps-seq
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.16.3
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: mumps-seq
    version: 5.1.2
source:
    fn: MUMPS_5.1.2.tar.gz
    patches:
        - examples-mpilibs.patch
        - shared-libseq.patch
        - shared-mumps.patch
        - shared-pord.patch
    sha256: eb345cda145da9aea01b851d17e54e7eef08e16bfa148100ac1f7f046cd42ae9
    url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/MUMPS_5.1.2.tar.gz
build:
    number: 1003
    run_exports:
        - mumps-seq >=5.1.2,<5.1.3.0a0
    script: ${RECIPE_DIR}/build-seq.sh
    string: h15930f7_1003
requirements:
    build:
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.31.1 h6176602_1
        - binutils_linux-64 2.31.1 h6176602_3
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.3.0 habb00fd_1
        - gcc_linux-64 7.3.0 h553295d_3
        - gfortran_impl_linux-64 7.3.0 hdf63c60_1
        - gfortran_linux-64 7.3.0 h553295d_3
        - libgcc-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libgfortran-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
    host:
        - blas 1.1 openblas
        - libgcc-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libgfortran-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - metis 5.1.0 hf484d3e_1003
        - openblas 0.3.3 h9ac9557_1001
        - scotch 6.0.6 h491eb26_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h14c3975_1003
    run:
        - blas 1.1 openblas
        - libgcc-ng >=7.3.0
        - libgfortran-ng >=7,<8.0a0
        - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
        - mumps-include >=5.1.2,<5.1.3.0a0
        - openblas >=0.3.3,<0.3.4.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.6,<6.1.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.6,<6.1.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq_seq-5.1.2${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/mumps_seq/mpi.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/mumps_seq/mpif.h"
about:
    description: 'MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for
        solving

        systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse

        matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or

        general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a

        direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian

        factorization.

        '
    doc_url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/index.php?page=doc
    home: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/
    license: CeCILL-C
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: 'MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - jbweston
        - minrk
